entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
